title: Condo Grade Downtown Union Station Modern 2 bed 2 bath in LoDo
posting_body: At this property, a pet-friendly apartment home gives you everything you want and need in your next home.
This urban and spacious two- bedroom is perfect.
From in-home washer and dryer to stainless steel appliances, this apartment's interior combines all the most important features you want.
Around the community, you can find a year-round resort style pool, bike storage and 24-hour fitness center, making living even better beyond your front door.
Ideally located in downtown Denver, this community provides you access to dining, shopping, arts, entertainment and recreation.
Steps from the Cherry Creek Trail this property offers the complete urban living experience in Denver.

Surrounded by old and new restaurants, connected walking paths, cultural establishments, Union Station, and a short walk to Coors Field, this is for the dreamers and doers that appreciate a faster pace and connected lifestyle.
Schedule your tour today with Blake at
and see why living here is the best of downtown Denver.
Call or TEXT to schedule your showing today!
*Restrictions Apply, pricing, availability, and lease terms subject to change anytime.
